price: Katakanlah, "Masing-masing (kita) menanti, maka nantikanlah oleh kamu sekalian! Maka kamu kelak akan mengetahui, siapa yang menempuh jalan yang lurus dan siapa yang telah mendapat petunjuk".
arabic: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul kullun mutarabbiṣun fatarabbaṣū fasataʿlamūna man aṣḥābu al-ṣirāṭi al-sawiyi wamani ih'tadā
